window redirect
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
        if (data == "fft") {
          window.open("http://127.0.0.1:1880/ui", "_self");
        } 
        // if (data == "GitHub") {
        //   //window.open("https://github.com/node-red");
        //   window.location.href = "https://github.com/node-red";
        // } 
    });
})(scope);
</script>

Set input step size
format:
<script>
    (async () => {
        await new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 1000));
        let collection = document.querySelectorAll('input[type=number]');
        // We use the second numeric input, NCO is first
        collection[1].step = "10000";
        collection[1].min = "40000000";
        collection[1].max = "6000000000";
        document.querySelectorAll(
        "md-list-item button.md-no-style.md-button.md-ink-ripple"
        )[0].addEventListener("click", () => {
        let collection = document.querySelectorAll("input[type=number]");
        collection[1].step = "10000";
        collection[1].min = "40000000";
        collection[1].max = "6000000000";
        console.log("cccccc")
        });
    })();
</script>

name: Text Panel 1
format:
<style>

    #tex1 {
        font-weight:bolder;
        letter-spacing: 4px;
        fill: red;
    }
    
    #tex2 {
        font-weight:bolder;
        letter-spacing: 4px;
        fill: lime;
    }
    
    #tex3 {
        font-weight:bolder;
        letter-spacing: 4px;
        fill: aqua;
    }
    
    #tex4 {
        font-weight:bolder;
        letter-spacing: 4px;
        fill: white;
    }
    
    #tex5 {
        font-weight:bolder;
        letter-spacing: 4px;
        fill: yellow;
}
    
</style>


<svg>


<text id="tex1" x="10" y="10" > {{msg.payload.key1}} </text>
<text id="tex2" x="10" y="30" > {{msg.payload.key2}} </text>
<text id="tex3" x="10" y="50" > {{msg.payload.key3}} </text>
<text id="tex4" x="10" y="70" > {{msg.payload.key4}} </text>
<text id="tex5" x="10" y="90" > {{msg.payload.key5}} </text>


</svg>

name: Click event listener for transmission control
format:
<script>
    // Click event on top meny item to set input props
     (async () => {
        const config_global = await getConfig();
        localStorage.setItem("config_global", JSON.stringify(config_global));
        await new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 1000));
        document.querySelectorAll(
            "md-list-item button.md-no-style.md-button.md-ink-ripple"
            )[0].addEventListener("click", () => {
        let collection = document.querySelectorAll("input[type=number]");
        collection[1].step = "10000";
        collection[1].min = "40000000";
        collection[1].max = "6000000000";
        console.log("cccccc")
        });
    })();
    async function getJSON() {
  return fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:1880/config`)
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .then((responseJson) => {
        return responseJson;
      });
}
async function getConfig() {
  return await getJSON();
}

</script>
